translation.en: [woman] Are we having a boy or a girl?
translation.de: Ist es ein Junge oder ein Mädchen?

translation.en: -[doctor] You sure you want to know? -Yes.

translation.de: Ich halte es kaum noch aus.

translation.en: -Is everything gonna be OK? -Your baby boy is healthy.
translation.de: -Ist alles in Ordnung? -Ihr Junge ist gesund.

translation.en: -We got months to get ready. -Yeah. I'm not worried about that.
translation.de: -Wir haben monatelang Zeit. -Ich mache mir keine Sorgen.

translation.en: Good. Then you shouldn't worry about tonight either.
translation.de: Gut, auch nicht wegen heute Abend.

translation.en: Right. 'Cause asking Tom Sutherland for his daughter's hand
translation.de: Klar. Weil es so einfach wird, Tom Sutherland um die Hand

translation.en: -is gonna be a walk in the park. -Would you rather tell him I'm pregnant?
translation.de: -seiner Tochter zu bitten. -Sagst du lieber, dass ich schwanger bin?

translation.en: Yeah. At least we'll have something to talk about this time.
translation.de: Ja. Wenigstens haben wir ein Gesprächsthema.

translation.en: Nothing to be afraid of. Just don't bring up the boat.
translation.de: Keine Angst. Sag einfach nichts wegen dem Boot.

translation.en: I try not to bring up the boat,
but then I get nervous and I end up bringing up the boat.
translation.de: aber dann werde ich nervös und erwähne das Boot.

translation.en: -He restored it himself, Will. -Yeah, I am aware of that little detail.
translation.de: -Er hat es selbst restauriert, Will. -Ja, das ist mir bewusst.

translation.en: -OK, I'll call you from the airport. Bye. -Yeah.
translation.de: -Ok, ich rufe vom Flughafen an. Tschüss. -Ja.

translation.en: OK, I think it's gonna be easy enough to get things going between us.
translation.de: Ok, es wird einfach, die Dinge in Gang zu bringen.

translation.en: Hey, there. Mr. and Mrs. Sutherland.
-Hi. Good to see you. -Hi. Good to see you, too.
I was just about to fix myself another drink.
translation.de: Ich wollte gerade noch einen Drink machen.

translation.en: Why don't you see if Paula can use a little hand in the kitchen?
translation.de: Sieh mal nach, ob Paula Hilfe in der Küche braucht.

translation.en: -Anything I can do to help? -Oh, no. You're our guest.
translation.de: -Kann ich helfen? -Oh nein, du bist unser Gast.

translation.en: -Why don't you have a seat? -Thank you.
How we looking at time, hon?
Not too long. Enjoy your scotch.
translation.de: Nicht mehr lange. Genießt euren Scotch.

translation.en: I think it was five, actually.
Sam has the same photo in our loft.
translation.de: Sam hat das  Foto in unserem Loft.

translation.en: You came with us. How could I forget that?
translation.de: Du kamst mit. Wie konnte ich das vergessen?

translation.en: Took me almost as long to make that one as it did the original.
translation.de: Dafür brauchte ich fast so lange, wie mit dem Original.

translation.en: Why don't you put her back down, Will? Let's just stay on the safe side. Alright?
translation.de: Stell es besser wieder hin, Will. Um sicher zu sein. Ok?

translation.en: Sam mentioned that the two of you are thinking about
-finding a house. -We're talking about it, yeah.
You know, at some point in the future it'd be nice to have some more room.
translation.de: In der Zukunft hätten wir gerne mehr Platz.

translation.en: -Here you go. -I am of two minds about it, you know?
-What are you of two minds about? -Providing assistance.
I need a guarantee that if it doesn't work out,
translation.de: Ich brauche Garantie, wenn es nicht klappt,

translation.en: you can't make any claims to the money that I put down. Nothing personal, Will.
translation.de: dass du keine Ansprüche auf das Geld erheben kannst. Nichts persönliches.

translation.en: Sorry, I'm a little confused. Did Sam ask you for help?
translation.de: Ich bin etwas verwirrt. Bat Sam um Hilfe?

translation.en: No, don't worry about any of that, Will. We've helped her brother, Steven, too.
translation.de: Nein, keine Sorge. Wir halfen auch ihrem Bruder Steven.

translation.en: You know that I'm making good money on this job, right?
If memory serves, you were unemployed before you moved to Seattle. Sam had to
translation.de: Du warst arbeitslos, bevor du nach Seattle zogst.

translation.en: -support both of you for a while there. -No, Sam didn't have to--
You know, like I said, work's good.
translation.de: Wie gesagt, die Arbeit läuft gut.

translation.en: you know, when it makes sense, when...
when it's the right time, then I'll open my own practice. But...
translation.de: Wenn die Zeit richtig ist, eröffne ich meine Praxis. Aber...

translation.en: Well, in the meantime, we're fine.
translation.de: In der Zwischenzeit geht es uns gut.

translation.en: -That's great. -Doesn't sound like much of a plan, Will.
Problem with your generation is that nobody wants to work for it.
translation.de: Aber deine Generation will nicht dafür arbeiten.

translation.en: I spent 27 years serving our country.
I saved and I saved until I started working for Northbridge,
translation.de: Ich sparte und sparte, bis ich für Northbridge arbeitete,

translation.en: where I started making some real money. But...
You know, I have never asked anyone for any help.
translation.de: Ich bat nie jemanden um Hilfe.

translation.en: And you're not asking for anything now.
translation.de: Und das tust du auch jetzt nicht.

translation.en: We're just offering to help our daughter.
translation.de: Wir wollen nur unserer Tochter helfen.

translation.en: Why did you move to Seattle?
translation.de: Warum seid ihr nach Seattle gezogen?

translation.en: because he thought it would be easier.
translation.de: weil er dachte, es sei einfacher.

translation.en: Because he thought it would be more secure
translation.de: Weil er dachte, es wäre sicherer,

translation.en: if he moved my daughter away from me.
translation.de: wenn meine Tochter von mir wegzieht.

translation.en: You know what, I doubt that. Sam would have told me that.
translation.de: Ich bezweifle das. Sam hätte es mir gesagt.

translation.en: You think she would have told you that she wanted to move away
translation.de: Glaubst du, sie hätte gesagt, dass sie wegziehen will,

translation.en: to start her life on her own terms with me,
translation.de: um mit mir zu ihren eigenen Bedingungen zu leben,

translation.en: without her father breathing down her fucking neck all the time?
translation.de: ohne dass ihr Vater ihr im verdammten Nacken sitzt?

translation.en: Say what you've gotta say, spit it out. Let us know how you really feel, Will.
translation.de: Sag, was du sagen willst. Sag uns, wie du wirklich fühlst.

translation.en: Get it off your chest, but just don't swear in front of my wife.
translation.de: Nur zu, aber fluche nicht vor meiner Frau.

translation.en: Whose table do you think you're sitting at?
translation.de: An wessen Tisch sitzt du wohl?

translation.en: Sweetheart, it's getting late. Let me walk you out.
translation.de: Schatz, es ist spät. Ich begleite dich hinaus.

translation.en: I was just lying down after the gym.
translation.de: Ich legte mich nach dem Fitnessstudio hin.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think so. You look like shit.
translation.de: Ja, das glaube ich nicht. Du siehst übel aus.

translation.en: Fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck, fuck.

translation.de: Oh, das ist... Das ist toll.

translation.en: Wait, wait. What did she say?
What do you think she said?
Yeah, OK. I'm sorry, alright? I'm sorry, but, Sam, look,
translation.de: Ja, ok. Es tut mir leid, ok? Aber Sam,

translation.en: he was into me from the second I got in, OK? I guarantee you
translation.de: er hackte sofort auf mir herum. Ich garantiere,

translation.en: if I'd asked for his blessing last night, he would have said no. So I didn't.
translation.de: hätte ich um seinen Segen gebeten, hätte er Nein gesagt. Also ließ ich es.

translation.en: -My mother asked you to leave. -No, no, she didn't.
It wasn't quite like that. She didn't ask me to leave.
translation.de: So war das nicht. Sie bat mich nicht, zu gehen.

translation.en: I'm really, really fucking late, OK? I gotta go.
translation.de: Ich bin verdammt spät dran, ok? Ich muss los.

translation.en: OK, fine. Just call me when you get to the airport.
translation.de: Na gut. Ruf mich vom Flughafen aus an.

translation.en: -Sam, what the hell is that? -[static] I'm scared.
translation.de: -Was zum Teufel ist das? -Ich habe Angst.

translation.en: Come on, Sam. Hi, it's me. I'm at the airport. Give me a call.
translation.de: Komm schon, Sam. Hi, ich bin's. Ich bin am Flughafen. Ruf zurück.

translation.en: [announcer] Flight 23 to Seattle is delayed until further notice.
translation.de: Flug 23 nach Seattle ist bis auf weiteres verspätet.

translation.en: [reporter] We have some breaking news for you right now.
translation.de: Wir haben eine Eilmeldung für Sie.

translation.en: We have unconfirmed reports this morning
translation.de: Wir haben heute Morgen unbestätigte Berichte

translation.en: of a large seismic event off the southern California coast.
translation.de: über ein großes seismisches Ereignis vor der Küste Südkaliforniens.

translation.en: We currently don't have contact with our Los Angeles bureau.
translation.de: Wir haben keinen Kontakt zu unserem Büro in Los Angeles.

translation.en: We're now getting news of power outages
across the western part of the United States,
translation.de: im westlichen Teil der Vereinigten Staaten

translation.en: and reports of telecommunication outages as well.
I want to stress this is all preliminary.
translation.de: Ich möchte betonen, dass dies vorläufig ist.

translation.en: We are reporting this just as we are learning it.
translation.de: Wir berichten dies, wenn wir es hören.

translation.en: We do not yet have any information on damages or casualties.
translation.de: Wir haben noch keine Informationen über Schäden oder Tote.

translation.en: Two hundred bucks. Back to the city.

translation.de: Sam, ich bin's. Ruf mich an.

translation.en: Hey, it's me again. Call me as soon as you get this, alright?
translation.de: Hey, ich noch mal. Ruf mich schnell zurück, ok?

translation.en: I guess that answers that question.
We thought that there was a chance that you flew back.
translation.de: Wir dachten, dass du zurückgeflogen bist.

translation.en: They shut down O'Hare. I didn't know where else to go.
translation.de: O'Hare ist dicht. Ich wusste nicht, wohin.

translation.en: Well, have you talked to Sam? I haven't been able to reach her.
translation.de: Hast du mit Sam gesprochen? Ich konnte sie nicht erreichen.

translation.en: Yeah. I was on the phone to her when it happened.
translation.de: Ja, ich sprach mit ihr, als es passierte.

translation.en: I heard something, so did she.
-What did you hear? -I don't know. It was like a...
Like a loud rumble or something. I didn't know what it was. And then...
translation.de: Wie ein lautes Grollen oder so. Ich wusste nicht, was es war. Und dann...

translation.en: -What's the last thing she said? -She said something's wrong.
Alright, I'm gonna go pack up the rest of my things. Yours are on the table.
translation.de: Ok, ich gehe packen. Deine Sachen sind auf dem Tisch.

translation.en: -I should head back to the airport. -I thought you said they shut it down.
translation.de: -Ich gehe zum Flughafen. -Ich dachte, er sei dicht.

translation.en: Yeah, but once the power comes back on, there'll be flights, right?
translation.de: Wenn der Strom angeht, fliegen sie wieder, oder?

translation.en: Let's look at what we know, Will.
There was an event, a couple of hours ago, out west.
translation.de: Vor ein paar Stunden passierte etwas im Westen.

translation.en: The power shut off here, two thousand miles away.
translation.de: Zweitausend Meilen entfernt haben wir keinen Strom.

translation.en: We have no idea what's happening, yet we've got F-22s doing flybys.
translation.de: Wir wissen nicht, was los ist, aber F-22 fliegen draußen herum.

translation.en: This moment is not about waiting for the power to come back on.
translation.de: Es geht nicht darum, dass der Strom zurückkommt.

translation.en: The only thing that we can control is what we decide to do.
translation.de: Wir können nur unsere Taten kontrollieren.

translation.en: So, what? What are you saying? What are you gonna do?
translation.de: Was denn? Was meinst du? Was wirst du tun?

translation.en: What, you're gonna drive to Seattle?
I only have one question for you.
-I love you. Be safe. -You'll be alright.
translation.de: -Ich liebe dich. Pass auf dich auf. -Alles wird gut.

translation.en: How can cell service still be out?
Fill her up with gas, I'll go get supplies.
Wanna show me the back seat?
-What are you talking about? -What's going on, Liza?
-This piece of shit just called me a slut. -What? Whoa, no, no.
translation.de: -Dieser Arsch nannte mich eine Schlampe. -Was? Nein.

translation.en: Hey, I didn't call you a slut.
translation.de: Hey, ich nannte dich keine Schlampe.

translation.en: I think this is gonna fucking cost you, man.
-That's my car. -Shut the fuck up, old man!
-Come on, I know you got some cash. -All right.
-Jesus Christ, Tom. -Get back in the car, Will.
Start running and don't look back!
Is there something you want to say?
-Told you what? -Told me that you had a gun.
And what would you have said, Will?
I'm assuming that you've never fired a firearm before.
No, I haven't used a firearm, but it's not exactly a priority in my law firm, is it?
translation.de: Nein, das ist in einer Kanzlei auch keine Priorität.

translation.en: You know what, Will, what if they had taken this car?
translation.de: Was, wenn sie das Auto genommen hätten?

translation.en: Game over. It would be game over!
translation.de: Es wäre aus. Aus und vorbei!

translation.en: Well, something must be going on if they're not letting us through.
-Is there another way? -No. We need this road.
Sir, the road's closed ahead. Follow the other cars. Thank you.
translation.de: Die Straße ist gesperrt. Folgen Sie den anderen.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Sergeant. But we got a lot of miles in front of us,
translation.de: Verzeihung, aber wir müssen weit fahren,

translation.en: and you're shutting down the biggest highway in the country.
translation.de: und Sie sperren den größten Highway.

translation.en: Public safety issue, sir. On account of the power outage.
No help for you out there if you have a flat or an accident.
translation.de: Bei einem Unfall kommt keine Hilfe.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Can I just have a word, Sergeant?
I understand you got a job to do.
And I know you got orders. I've been there.
I spent the better part of my adult life in the Marine Corps.
translation.de: Ich war lange im Marine Corps.

translation.en: We'd be on our own, I understand.
But my daughter's a long ways in that direction.
translation.de: Meine Tochter lebt in diese Richtung.

translation.en: I'm asking, can you help me?
Let the Caddy through! Local traffic, lives past the next exit.
translation.de: Lasst den Caddy durch! Nahverkehr an der nächsten Ausfahrt.

translation.en: Apparently, we're not the only ones heading west.
translation.de: Nicht nur wir fahren nach Westen.

translation.en: The F-22s, the road block. What is this?
translation.de: Die F-22s, die Straßensperre. Was ist das?

translation.en: Jesus Christ. I didn't even see him coming.
translation.de: Himmel, ich sah ihn nicht mal kommen.

translation.en: He probably can't run our plates.
translation.de: Er kann das Kennzeichen nicht prüfen.

translation.en: I'm gonna check it out, OK?
-Is there a problem, Officer? -Get back in the car!
Will! Get back in the car!
Tell your friend to get out of the fucking car!
-OK. Fuck. -Tell him to get out of the fucking car!
Will, let's go! Go, go, go!
Fuck. Get the ammo for the SIG in the trunk!
translation.de: Scheiße. Hol die Munition für die SIG!

translation.en: -What? It wasn't loaded before? -I didn't need it to be.
Will, just get the ammo out of the go bag.
translation.de: Will, hol die Munition aus der Go-Tasche.

translation.en: You see the black bag? Little black bag?
-Yeah, I got it. He's coming! -Take it out.
translation.de: -Ja, ich hab sie. Er kommt! -Nimm sie raus.

translation.en: Put the mag into the weapon.
-How do I do it? -Put the mag in the gun.
Hit the button on the side. Shoot. You gotta do it. Shoot.
translation.de: Drück den Knopf an der Seite. Schießen. Los.

translation.en: -Fuck, it's not working! What do I do? -Pull it back! Put it in the chamber!
translation.de: -Scheiße, es funktioniert nicht! Was nun? -Ziehen! In die Kammer!

translation.en: Put the bullet in the chamber. Pull the top back.
translation.de: Kugel in die Kammer. Oberteil zurückziehen.

translation.en: -See if you have a cartridge inside. -Fuck!
Get out of the car, faggot. Now.
I think I broke my ribs.
We're gonna need to find a garage.
We were... We've been in an accident.
-You guys even know where you are? -No.
-We were hoping for your help. -You guys got money?
-I ain't doing shit for free. -Nor should you.
If you need new parts, I can't help you.
translation.de: Mit Ersatzteilen kann ich nicht helfen.

translation.en: -Understood. -Restroom's all the way in the back.
Hey! I told you not to fuck with them!
Who the fuck do you think you are?
translation.de: Was glaubst du, wer du bist?

translation.en: [man] So, all cell service goes out.
Virtually all communications, except local ham radio like us or short wave.
translation.de: Alle Kommunikationen, außer lokaler Amateurfunk oder Kurzwelle.

translation.en: But how does that happen, huh? US Government goes virtually silent?
translation.de: Wie ist das passiert? Die US-Regierung verstummt?

translation.en: Are we talking World War Three? Like a nuke attack that went sideways?
translation.de: Ist das der Dritte Weltkrieg? Ein verpatzter Atombombenangriff?

translation.en: I mean, the damned president's doing a massive cover-up.
Military coup? Martial law? We don't know, we don't know.
translation.de: Militärputsch? Kriegsrecht? Wir wissen es nicht.

translation.en: If anyone out there who knows anything, get on short wave. Please, do it now.
translation.de: Wenn irgendjemand etwas weiß, geht auf Kurzwelle.

translation.en: -Is anyone out there? -[man] Two thousand satellites in space,
-all of them down? -[woman] Answer me, I--
[man] Government knows, man. They're just keeping it from us.
translation.de: Die Regierung weiß es und schweigt.

translation.en: I sealed the radiator. It should hold.
translation.de: Ich versiegelte den Kühler. Sollte halten.

translation.en: -You can keep driving for a while. -A while?
Radiator isn't gonna break. Might start leaking again, though.
translation.de: Der Kühler geht nicht kaputt, könnte aber wieder lecken.

translation.en: I can give you some of the sealant, show you how to use it.
translation.de: Ich zeige Ihnen, wie man Dichtungsmittel benutzt.

translation.en: I'll gave you $200 for the labor.
And if we get to where we're going, I'll mail you another two.
translation.de: Und weitere 200, wenn wir unser Ziel erreichen.

translation.en: Yeah. How about you give me that other two right now?
translation.de: Ja. Warum geben Sie mir die anderen 200 nicht jetzt?

translation.en: Is that your Buick out there?
No, I was gonna head out to California and get the fuck out of this place.
translation.de: Nein, ich wollte nach Kalifornien und von hier verschwinden.

translation.en: But now all she needs is a new transmission, so she ain't for sale.
translation.de: Es braucht ein neues Getriebe, also nicht zu verkaufen.

translation.en: Then maybe you should come with us.
-I don't think so. -We're going out west.
Yeah? Why would I want to go with you?
You can keep the cash and be almost all the way to California.
translation.de: Du kannst... ...das Geld behalten und... ...fast in Kalifornien sein.

translation.en: If you have any problems or a break down, you can fix it.
translation.de: Haben wir Probleme, kannst du es reparieren.

translation.en: No disrespect, but I ain't about doing no road trip right now
translation.de: Ich will nicht unhöflich sein, aber ich mache jetzt keine Roadtrips

translation.en: with two shady dudes that appear out of nowhere.
translation.de: mit zwielichtigen Gestalten, die einfach auftauchen.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa. We're not shady, come on.
You two roll up in a fucked-up, shot up cop car that you say you found,
translation.de: Sie kommen mit einem durchlöcherten Polizeiauto, das Sie fanden,

translation.en: towing a shot up Caddy, and...
You know, you got blood all over your face. So, yeah.
translation.de: Sie haben Blut im Gesicht. Also ja.

translation.en: I hear you loud and clear. Doesn't look good.
translation.de: Verstehe. Es sieht nicht gut aus.

translation.en: I could tell you that it wasn't us.
translation.de: Ich könnte sagen, wir waren das nicht.

translation.en: we were you just defending ourselves. I could tell you
translation.de: ...wir uns nur verteidigten. Ich könnte sagen,

translation.en: actually what happened, down to the very last detail, but...
translation.de: was passiert ist, bis ins letzte Detail, aber...

translation.en: if I were you, I'm not sure I would believe that either.
translation.de: ...an deiner Stelle würde ich es auch nicht glauben.

translation.en: But I can tell you this.
With a clear conscience, I can look you in the eye and I can say...
translation.de: Mit gutem Gewissen kann ich dir in die Augen schauen und sagen...

translation.en: there's a lot to be afraid of out there.
None of us know how much.
We're just driving out west to see if we can find my daughter.
translation.de: Wir fahren nur nach Westen, um meine Tochter zu finden.

translation.en: I'll do it for two thousand.
As long as we don't snap an axle, I can get us to Seattle.
translation.de: Bricht keine Achse, kommen wir nach Seattle.

translation.en: Oh, and I siphoned the cop's gas.
translation.de: Ich habe das Benzin des Polizisten.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I want us to be invisible from behind.
-Here you go, Will. Drive the first shift. -OK.
Course Tonto rides in the fucking back.
So, you guys got a radio signal?
Is there a frontage road to the 90? Another way west?
translation.de: Gibt es einen anderen Weg zur 90? Nach Westen?

translation.en: Take a left here. Can head out on the 14 West for a while.
translation.de: Hier links abbiegen. Wir nehmen die 14 nach Westen.

translation.en: What kinda music you guys into?
Yeah, I don't think it's that kind of road trip, Ricki.
translation.de: So ein Roadtrip ist das nicht, Ricki.

translation.en: Yeah, let him. He's gonna want to drive when he wakes up.
translation.de: Ja, lass ihn. Er wird fahren, wenn er aufwacht.

translation.en: So, his daughter... that's your girl?
-They on our side of the road? -Jesus!
-I think it's a telephone number. -Will, let him be.
We're hours from a hospital, and this guy, he's not gonna make it.
translation.de: Kein Krankenhaus in der Nähe, er wird nicht überleben.

translation.en: Let's get back in the car. Let's go, guys. Let's go. Let's go.
translation.de: Steigt ins Auto. Gehen wir. Na los.

translation.en: You gotta stop the car for Ricki. Stop the car, Tom. Stop the fucking car!
translation.de: Halt an für Ricki. Halt an, Tom. Anhalten, verdammt!

translation.en: If Will hadn't told me to wait, I would've left you.
translation.de: Wäre Will nicht gewesen, wäre ich gefahren.

translation.en: See if I fix your car if it breaks down again.
translation.de: Mal sehen, ob ich das Auto repariere.

translation.en: We had a deal. If you're not gonna honor it, you need to speak up now.
translation.de: Wir hatten eine Abmachung. Sag es, wenn du ihn nicht einhältst.

translation.en: Yeah, he can be pretty hard.
You don't know what hard is, man.
translation.de: Sie wissen nicht, was hart ist.

translation.en: What? You don't think that I got it?
translation.de: Was? Ich habe es nicht drauf?

translation.en: No, of course I do. I just, you know, I thought it was a pretty odd career path.
translation.de: Natürlich hast du's drauf. Es ist nur eine seltsame Karriere.

translation.en: You ever seen clouds like that before?
-Go, go! Get in the car! -Get in!
You see the bridge? Do you see it?
What the fuck is going on?
translation.de: Was zum Teufel geht hier vor?

translation.en: -Never seen a storm like this. -This is crazy.
translation.de: -Ich hab noch nie so einen Sturm gesehen. -Verrückt.

translation.en: [man] ...as much information as we can, for as long as we can.
translation.de: ...so viele Informationen wie möglich, solange wir können.

translation.en: For as long as this generator will let us.
Still no internet. No cell service. No nothing.
translation.de: Immer noch kein Internet. Kein Handyempfang. Nichts.

translation.en: You're gonna want to stay on the 17.
I have friends in Ashland Heights. I already checked.
translation.de: Ich hab Freunde in Ashland Heights. Ich hab nachgeschaut.

translation.en: We can stop there. We can resupply.
translation.de: Wir halten dort an und holen Nachschub.

translation.en: We can resupply anywhere. We don't wanna go out of our way.
translation.de: Das können wir überall. Keine Umwege.

translation.en: Look, why don't we just stop, OK?
translation.de: Halten wir dort einfach an, ok?

translation.en: Ricki can check the car and my friends can help us.
translation.de: Ricki sieht nach dem Auto, meine Freunde helfen uns.

translation.en: -You just drive. I got the plans. -I said they're friends, Tom.
translation.de: -Fahr einfach. Ich hab die Pläne. -Das sind Freunde, Tom.

translation.en: They're not just my friends, they're Sam's friends.
translation.de: Nicht nur meine, auch von Sam.

translation.en: No services here. No gas, no nothing.
translation.de: Keine Dienste hier. Kein Benzin, nichts.

translation.en: We've been on the road for a long time. A good friend of mine lives in the town.
translation.de: Wir waren lange unterwegs. Ein guter Freund wohnt hier.

translation.en: Every car that stops here says they got friends in this little town.
translation.de: Alle, die hier anhalten, sagen das.

translation.en: His name's Adam Dumont. He was born and raised here.
translation.de: Er heißt Adam Dumont. Er ist hier aufgewachsen.

translation.en: I was a groomsman at his wedding.
translation.de: Ich war Trauzeuge bei seiner Hochzeit.

translation.en: My girlfriend and I have been here, like, half a dozen times.
translation.de: Meine Freundin und ich waren oft hier.

translation.en: she owns a pottery store in town. I can't remember what the name of it is.
translation.de: besitzt ein Töpfergeschäft hier. Ich erinnere mich nicht, wie es heißt.

translation.en: We just wanna get off the road for a couple of hours and then we'll be gone.
translation.de: Wir halten nur ein paar Stunden und verschwinden dann.

translation.en: Find an escort for these boys over to the Dumonts'.
translation.de: Jemand soll sie zu den Dumonts begleiten.

translation.en: And make sure, they get turned away, they come straight back here.
translation.de: Wenn sie abgewiesen werden, sollen sie hierher zurückkommen.

translation.en: [man on radio] Is it North Korea? Is it the Chinese?
translation.de: Ist es Nordkorea? Sind es die Chinesen?

translation.en: Who else could do this? Who else would do this?
translation.de: Wer könnte das sonst tun? Wer würde das sonst tun?

translation.en: Damn it. Maybe they're in it together.
translation.de: Verdammt. Vielleicht stecken sie zusammen drin.

translation.en: We do know they hate us.
translation.de: Wir wissen, dass sie uns hassen.

translation.en: How did you even get here?
This is Tom, Sam's dad. And Ricki in the back.
translation.de: Das ist Tom, Sams Dad. Und Ricki sitzt hinten.

translation.en: Hey. We should all go inside.
I'm gonna take a couple of minutes to check out the car and get organized.
translation.de: Ich werde nur kurz Auto überprüfen.
-Wo... Wo ist Sammy? -Ich erkläre es drinnen.

translation.en: The Bible says, "The earth knew not
translation.de: Die Bibel sagt: "Die Erde wusste nichts,

translation.en: until the flood came and took them...
translation.de: bis die Flut kam und sie mitnahm...

translation.en: When was last time you heard from Adam?
translation.de: Wann hast du zuletzt von Adam gehört?

translation.en: I guess the night before it all, so...
translation.de: Ich schätze die Nacht vor all dem, also...

translation.en: He's... He's on a business trip to San Francisco.
translation.de: Er... Er ist auf einer Geschäftsreise nach San Francisco.

translation.en: Well, if anyone's gonna be OK, it's Adam.
translation.de: Wenn es jemand schafft, dann Adam.

translation.en: I mean, none of this makes any sense. It's just that...
translation.de: Nichts davon ergibt Sinn. Es ist nur...

translation.en: These fucking storms and then this heat. And we've been having earthquakes.
translation.de: Diese verdammten Stürme, dann diese Hitze. Und wir hatten Erdbeben.

translation.en: It's just... I mean, it's so crazy that you're here and...
translation.de: Es ist... Es ist verrückt, dass du hier bist und...

translation.en: it can't stay like this forever.
Really? Do you really think that?
-Sorry. I haven't been sleeping and it... -No, it's fine, It's OK.
translation.de: -Tut mir leid. Ich hab nicht geschlafen... -Nein, schon ok.

translation.en: Do you want to take a shower? We still have plenty of water.
translation.de: Willst du duschen? Wir haben noch viel Wasser.

translation.en: -Need help? -Nah, I just got one more left.
How do we not know anything?
Doesn't that tell you something, Will? If they were all right, we would know.
translation.de: Sagt dir das nichts, Will? Wären sie ok, wüssten wir es.

translation.en: I just... None of this is real. It can't be real.
translation.de: Ich... Nichts davon ist real. Es kann nicht echt sein.

translation.en: No one's telling me anything and...
and no one even knows that I'm here.
translation.de: ...und niemand weiß, dass ich hier bin.

translation.en: Adam knows you're here. And he's coming back for you. I know that.
translation.de: Adam weiß, dass du hier bist. Und er kommt zurück.

translation.en: Because I can feel it, Will.
translation.de: Weil ich es fühlen kann, Will.

translation.en: I can feel that he's gone.
translation.de: Ich kann fühlen, dass er tot ist.

translation.en: -I can feel it in my bones. I know it. -No, no, no. Just...
translation.de: -Ich spüre es einfach. Ich weiß es. -Nein. Nur...

translation.en: And I know that Sam is gone, Will. She's gone!
translation.de: Und Sam ist auch tot, Will. Sie ist tot!

translation.en: We are gonna be fine. OK?
Adam is coming back for you.
We need to load the supplies in the car.
Let's see if there's anything useful down there.
translation.de: Mal sehen, ob dort etwas Nützliches ist.

translation.en: Holy shit! Holy fuck! It's hot in there!
I thought it was gonna be cold.
-It's not funny. -It kinda is a little bit funny.
OK. We're gonna need to split up.
I just think it's funny that the Army
translation.de: Es ist witzig, dass die Armee

translation.en: named its helicopters after tribes they tried to wipe out.
translation.de: ihre Hubschrauber nach Stämmen benannte, die sie vernichten wollten.

translation.en: Look, Ricki. You're on gas detail.
Want you to grab the cans, check out the cars,
translation.de: Nimm die Kanister, prüfe die Autos,

translation.en: look at the generators, whatever you find. We're gonna go check out the diner.
translation.de: schau dir die Generatoren an. Wir suchen Abendessen.

translation.en: So, what are we looking for?
Be sure to get what we need.
-I said get gas! -I already found some.
Cars had their tires slashed, but still had gas in the back.
translation.de: Die Reifen waren aufgeschlitzt, aber Benzin war noch da.

translation.en: Wake up. Both of you, wake up.
Check your phone. Ricki, check your phone. Tom, check your phone now.
translation.de: Prüfe dein Handy, Ricki. Tom überprüfe dein Handy.

translation.en: I just heard. We got cell reception, I think.
I love you. Can you hear me?
translation.de: Ich hab dich lieb. Hörst du mich?

translation.en: The message is two days old.
-Where the hell are they coming from? -I don't know.
-Jesus. We should turn around. -This road's the only way over the pass.
translation.de: -Himmel. Wir sollten umkehren. -Diese Straße führt über den Pass.

translation.en: -This is a mistake. Why are we stopping? -I just want to see what's going on.
translation.de: -Das ist ein Fehler. Warum halten wir? -Ich will sehen, was los ist.

translation.en: -You OK, lady? What happened? -I need help.
translation.de: -Alles ok? Was ist passiert? -Ich brauche Hilfe.

translation.en: OK, why don't you just come to us. It's safer over here.
translation.de: Ok, kommen Sie zu uns. Hier ist es sicherer.

translation.en: You just need to get in the car. It's safer in the car. Come on, come on.
translation.de: Steigen Sie ins Auto. Dort ist es sicherer. Na los.

translation.en: -I just need help. -Where's your spare? Is it in the car?
translation.de: -Ich brauche Hilfe. -Ist der Ersatzreifen im Auto?

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know.
I can't. I don't know how. I need help.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht. Ich weiß nicht wie. Ich brauche Hilfe.

translation.en: -You happy? You happy now? -Go get it.
-What the fuck is he doing? -It's not personal.
-We all got places to be. -Stay calm.
Stay calm, all right? Stay calm.
-Open it. -It's locked and I don't have the key.
Don't. Don't fucking do it, man.
-Just leave us one canister, please. -Shut your fucking mouth.
Get the gas. Let's get the hell out of here.
Just get the gas. Let's fucking go, man.
translation.de: Nehmt das Benzin. Na los, Mann.

translation.en: Don't leave us here to die.
-Let's fucking go. -You're killing us. Don't take the gas!
translation.de: -Na los. -Ihr bringt uns um. Lasst das Benzin.

translation.en: -All right. Come on, get in the car. -Why'd you stop?
-We're supposed to be decent. -Get in the car. We have to go right now!
translation.de: -Wir sollen anständig sein. -Einsteigen. Wir müssen los!

translation.en: I'm staying with him. I'm not leaving my husband like this. Not with you people!
translation.de: Ich bleibe bei ihm. Ich verlasse meinen Mann nicht. Nicht mit euch!

translation.en: We gotta go. If we don't catch them, we're dead. Come on, go.
translation.de: Wir müssen aufholen, sonst sind wir tot.

translation.en: -Come on, get in the car! -Let's go, Will. Can't lose them.
Come on! Come on, damn it.
You go it. Shoot the tire, Ricki!
translation.de: Du schaffst das. Schieß auf den Reifen, Ricki!

translation.en: -I can't open it! -Let go of me!
-Come on, Ricki. Come on. Damn it! -I can't! He's holding it.
translation.de: -Na los, Ricki. Los. -Er hält es fest.

translation.en: We're running out of time. Go, go. Come on!
translation.de: Wir haben keine Zeit. Na los!

translation.en: -I can't pull over here, Ricki. -I said pull over.
They robbed us, Ricki. They were gonna kill us.
translation.de: Sie raubten uns aus. Sie hätten getötet.

translation.en: You saved us. That's the truth.
-You did a good thing. -Yeah? For what?
translation.de: -Das war eine gute Sache. -Ja? Für was?

translation.en: So I can do this all over again?
translation.de: Um es noch mal zu tun?

translation.en: It's another fucking thousand miles to Seattle.
translation.de: Es sind weitere verdammte 1.500 km nach Seattle.

translation.en: -It's OK. It's OK. -I'm not gonna shoot you!
I'd rather go back to the fucking rez than spend another minute here with you.
translation.de: Ich gehe lieber wieder zurück, als mit euch hier zu sein.

translation.en: We're in the middle of fucking nowhere.
You think that I wouldn't make it?
translation.de: Denkst du, ich schaffe es nicht?

translation.en: Who do you think's been taking care of me since the day that I was born?
translation.de: Wer kümmert sich wohl seit meiner Geburt um mich?

translation.en: We'll survive this longer than you.
-Fuck both you guys. -Ricki, OK, let's just take a...
We're gonna take a second, all right? And we're gonna rest here.
translation.de: Wir warten nur kurz und ruhen uns hier aus, ok?
Du hast uns gerettet. Vergiss das nicht.

translation.en: Let's just give her a minute.
Should never have asked her to come with us.
-All right. Let's get some help right now. -No time. My lungs are collapsing.
translation.de: -Ok. Wir suchen Hilfe. -Keine Zeit. Meine Lungen kollabieren.

translation.en: -Gotta let the pressure out. -OK. How, how would--
translation.de: -Lass den Druck raus. -Ok. Wie soll ich...

translation.en: -What you want me to do? -Put it in.
your father left you. That's ugly.
translation.de: ...dein Vater hätte dich verlassen. Das ist schlimm.

translation.en: And you were just a kid, right?
translation.de: Du warst nur ein Kind, ja?

translation.en: I guess. He lives in Idaho now with his new family. I see him...
translation.de: Denke schon. Er lebt in Idaho mit seiner neuen Familie. Ich sehe ihn...

translation.en: It's a shame that you never got to meet my father.
translation.de: Schade, dass du meinen Vater nie kennen gelernt hast.

translation.en: Sam must have told you some stories about him.
translation.de: Sam hat dir sicher von ihm erzählt.

translation.en: He had this... had this look,
when he thought you crossed the line.
translation.de: Wenn er dachte, du gingst zu weit.

translation.en: It wasn't in disappointment, you know?
translation.de: Er war nicht enttäuscht, weißt du?

translation.en: 'cause he was disgusted at the fact that he brought you into the world.
translation.de: Er war angewidert, dass er dich in die Welt gebracht hat.

translation.en: I mean, in his heart, he was a good man.
translation.de: Im Herzen war er ein guter Mann.

translation.en: I don't know if I'm a good father.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob ich gut bin.

translation.en: You know I love your daughter.
If I didn't think that, I would have killed you a long time ago.
translation.de: Sonst hätte ich dich schon längst umgebracht.

translation.en: You'll be on your own soon.
I need to ask your word on something.
translation.de: Du musst mir dein Wort geben.

translation.en: Yeah, of course, anything. Whatever you want.
translation.de: Ja, natürlich. Was immer du willst.

translation.en: that you'll always keep her safe.
of course I will. I promise you.
there's something I need to tell you.
No, no. You don't know this, Tom. No, you don't know.
translation.de: Nein, davon weißt du nichts, Tom.

translation.en: What do you mean you know? How'd you know?
Paula, she called her after our dinner,
translation.de: Paula rief nach dem Essen an

translation.en: Said that you're having a baby boy!
translation.de: Dass es ein kleiner Junge wäre.

translation.en: I got to tell you something else, too.
I got to tell you about the boat.
Seriously? You know, why don't you quit while you're ahead on this.
translation.de: Im Ernst? Hör auf, während du vorne liegst.

translation.en: You know all that shit you gave me,
The really funny thing is you...
you think it was me that was driving that boat when it crashed into the rock.
translation.de: ...du denkst, ich fuhr das Boot, als es in den Felsen krachte.

translation.en: -Get out! It was Sam? -Yeah. Hell, yeah.
drunk as anything. I mean, we both were and...
translation.de: Sie war echt besoffen. Wir beide, und...

translation.en: you know, when we came down in the morning,
and we see the boat, it had sunk to the bottom of the fucking lake, I mean...
translation.de: und sahen, dass das Boot unterging...

translation.en: I thought it was the right thing to do, you know
You're gonna be a good father.
translation.de: Du wirst ein guter Vater sein.

translation.en: Maybe we can get some help here.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
My friend is sick. He needs a doctor.
All right, we're coming. Just don't shoot.
-Wait, we can't go over there. -Yeah, no shit, Tom.
translation.de: -Warte, wir können nicht da hin. -Ja, sag bloß, Tom.

translation.en: When I say three, I want you to swerve to your left.
translation.de: Auf drei, weichst du nach links aus.

translation.en: I'm going west, trying to get to Seattle.
We've been staying off the interstate. It's not safe.
translation.de: Fern von der Interstate. Es ist nicht sicher.

translation.en: All right, we'll take you as far as we can.
translation.de: Wir bringen Sie so weit wie möglich.

translation.en: I got family in the car.
Do you have any idea what happened?
Started in Los Angeles. Or at least...
translation.de: Es begann in Los Angeles. Oder zumindest...

translation.en: They're saying go to Canada. Something about the air.
translation.de: Wir sollen nach Kanada gehen. Wegen der Luft.

translation.en: -It's been three days now? -No. Today's day five.
Yeah, yeah. It's my father's place.
There's bedrooms upstairs if you want to rest.
And hopefully there's some food in the kitchen, take a look.
translation.de: Und hoffentlich etwas zu essen in der Küche.

translation.en: Look, I just want to say
There's about three weeks of food here.
Generator last will you five days, maybe more if you're conservative.
translation.de: Der Generator hält fünf Tage, vielleicht mehr.

translation.en: There's one car in the garage, but I had to siphon off most of the gas.
translation.de: Ein Auto in der Garage, aber ich nahm das meiste Benzin.

translation.en: But if you look around, you're gonna find enough to get north.
translation.de: Aber Sie finden genug, um nach Norden zu fahren.

translation.en: But I need to leave right now.
And I need a four-wheel drive.
Which means I need to take your Jeep.
That's the deal that I'm offering.
He's our neighbor, Will. Put your guns down!
translation.de: Er ist unser Nachbar, Will. Waffen runter!

translation.en: You know, I wouldn't have made it without him.
translation.de: Ohne ihn hätte ich es nicht geschafft.

translation.en: And I did everything I could. I did everything.
I'm never gonna leave you again.
You know, when I saw Seattle, I didn't think that...
translation.de: Als ich Seattle sah, dachte ich nicht...

translation.en: before the police were just yelling at everybody to evacuate.
I mean, you could see the Sound
and the water retreat. I've never seen anything like that before.
translation.de: und das Wasser zurückweichen. Hab ich noch nie gesehen.

translation.en: We were a couple miles inland by the time the waves hit.
translation.de: Wir waren landeinwärts, als die Wellen kamen.

translation.en: And just so you know, Will...
I don't think this was an earthquake.
translation.de: Ich denke, es war kein Erdbeben.

translation.en: I've seen tons of war games simulations,
to erase rational behavior with what appears to be a singular incident.
translation.de: um rationales Verhalten mit einem einzigartigen Ereignis auszulöschen.

translation.en: What the fuck you talking about?
-Look, I'm not trying to upset you. -You're not upsetting me.
translation.de: -Ich will dich nicht verärgern. -Das tust du nicht.

translation.en: I know the last couple days have been rough on you.
translation.de: Die letzten Tage waren hart für dich.

translation.en: I mean, come on, you don't really believe this bullshit, do you?
translation.de: Du glaubst diesen Quatsch doch nicht, oder?

translation.en: I just drove across the fucking country. You can't create things that I've seen.
translation.de: Ich fuhr gerade durchs ganze Land. So was kann man nicht erschaffen.

translation.en: -Seriously, are you fucking with me? -No, I'm not fucking with you.
Think about it in laymen's terms. A nuclear bomb goes off the coast.
translation.de: Einfacher ausgedrückt, eine Atombombe vor der Küste.

translation.en: Then a virus takes down the grid before anyone can figure out what happened.
translation.de: Ein Virus schaltet das Netz aus, bevor jemand herausfindet, was passierte.

translation.en: -I've seen the intel. -You haven't seen it. There is no intel.
translation.de: -Ich sah die Infos. -Hast du nicht. Es gibt keine.

translation.en: -That is fucking bullshit. -The bomb plays like an earthquake.
translation.de: -Das ist Quatsch. -Die Bombe ist wie ein Erdbeben.

translation.en: But the power going out, that created the chaos.
Don't you think it's strange that...
the power just went out everywhere?
The communications? I mean, just fucking think about it, man.
translation.de: Die Kommunikation? Denk doch mal darüber nach, Mann.

translation.en: Unless, I don't know, I don't know. Maybe he believes in coincidences.
translation.de: Es sei denn, du glaubst an Zufälle.

translation.en: I'm gonna clean up here. all right?
And we can talk about all this in the morning, all right?
When you've had a good rest and you're feeling better, OK?
You know, there was an ash cloud over the ocean.
translation.de: Es liegt eine Aschewolke über dem Ozean.

translation.en: God knows how many other cities.
translation.de: Gott weiß wie viele andere Städte.

translation.en: I don't know what the fuck is going on,
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was hier los ist,

translation.en: and you do not know what the fuck is going on either.
translation.de: und du weißt das verdammt noch mal auch nicht.

translation.en: So, let's not pretend that you do, OK?
translation.de: Tu also nicht, als ob, ok?

translation.en: They happen all the time now.
Well, in the end, it doesn't really matter, I guess.
We all have to live, right?
Can I see that SIG of yours?
Be nicer with bullets, though, right?
I know he helped you, but he just...
Tell me you don't believe that bullshit that he's telling you?
translation.de: Du glaubst den Quatsch doch nicht, oder?

translation.en: are the only thing that matters.
I let the whiskey do the talking.
translation.de: Da sprach der Whisky in mir.

translation.en: I guess I just convinced myself that that would put me more in control, but...
translation.de: Ich habe mich davon überzeugt, dass ich dadurch Kontrolle habe, aber...

translation.en: It doesn't make me crazy, right?
translation.de: Es macht mich nicht verrückt, oder?

translation.en: Why were you looking in my car this morning?
translation.de: Was hast du in meinem Auto gesucht?

translation.en: I wasn't trying to steal your car, Will, if that's what you're after.
translation.de: Ich wollte es nicht stehlen, wenn du das meinst.

translation.en: I saw two kids. I thought that maybe they took something from your car.
translation.de: Ich dachte zwei Kinder hätten was vom Auto gestohlen.

translation.en: Where are these kids right now?
I've been running a perimeter every morning since we got here.
translation.de: Seit wir hier sind, suche ich den Umkreis ab.

translation.en: Come with me, I'll show you.
Must be a volcano around here.
Unless you want to stay, you should come with us.
I don't see any kids out here.
I'm not the boogie man, Will.
We have a bond. That means I get a voice.
translation.de: Wir haben eine Bindung. Ich darf also abstimmen.

translation.en: Well, I'm not, am I? I'm here.
translation.de: Bin ich aber nicht. Ich bin hier.

translation.en: You don't have to do this.
-OK. OK. Where's Jeremiah? -He tried to kill me. Come on.
translation.de: -Ok. Wo ist Jeremiah? -Er wollte mich töten. Komm.

translation.en: We're gonna make it. No matter what happens, we're gonna make it, OK?
translation.de: Wir schaffen das. Egal was passiert, ok?

translation.en: Look at me, OK? Look at me.
